title: Dare ga Otome Geemu Dato Itta! - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Androgynous Characters   Brother Complex   Carefree Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Doting Older Siblings   Familial Love   Family   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Master-Servant Relationship   Mob Protagonist   Multiple POV   Nobles   Otome Game   Overprotective Siblings   R-18   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Sickly Characters   Tragic Past   Transmigration
author: Narayama Bakufu   楢山幕府
description:
The protagonist has reincarnated into the body of the capture target’s dying younger brother in the fantasy ADV otome game, “Trickster Dreams in the Mirror.”

Though the sickly protagonist regains the memories of his former life, his personality did not carry over. This is the story of a supporting character whose only role was to die, breaking flags so that he may struggle to live even a little longer. As a result, this is a story of a slightly different flag that was broken.>
